png

Class ChunkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • png.ChunkHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageHandler

    public class ChunkHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageHandler
    Handles the processing and collection of metadata-related chunks from a PNG image file.

    This handler processes PNG chunks such as:

    • tEXt, iTXt, zTXt – textual metadata chunks
    • eXIf – embedded EXIF metadata (in TIFF format)

    This class is typically used during PNG metadata parsing and delegates specific parsing responsibilities to appropriate chunk or Exif handlers.

    Since:
    21 June 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChunkHandler

        public ChunkHandler()
        This default constructor should not be used. It always throws an exception.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - always thrown to prevent misuse

      • ChunkHandler

        public ChunkHandler(java.nio.file.Path fpath,
                    SequentialByteReader reader,
                    java.util.EnumSet<ChunkType> requiredChunks)
        Constructs a handler to parse selected chunks from a PNG image file.
        Parameters:
        fpath - the PNG file path
        reader - byte reader for raw PNG stream
        requiredChunks - an optional set of chunk types to be extracted (null means all chunks are selected)

    • Method Detail

      • readChunks

        private void readChunks()
                 throws ImageReadErrorException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Reads the PNG data stream and extracts matching chunk types into memory.
        Throws:
        ImageReadErrorException - if invalid structure or duplicate chunks are found
        java.io.IOException - if I/O issues occur while reading

      • addChunk

        private void addChunk(int length,
                      ChunkType chunkType,
                      int crc,
                      byte[] data)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a parsed chunk to the internal chunk collection. Special types such as iTXt, zTXt, and tEXt are instantiated into specific subclasses.
        Parameters:
        length - the data length of the chunk
        chunkType - the type of PNG chunk
        crc - the CRC value (currently not implemented)
        data - raw chunk data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if processing fails

      • existsChunk

        private boolean existsChunk(int chunkID)
        Checks if a chunk with the given ID already exists in the parsed chunk list.
        Parameters:
        chunkID - the unique index ID of a chunk
        Returns:
        true if the chunk is already present

      • processMetadata

        public Metadata<? extends BaseMetadata> processMetadata()
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        ImageReadErrorException
        Begins metadata processing by scanning the PNG file and extracting chunk data. EXIF data (from eXIf) is parsed using TifParser, and textual chunks are collected into a ChunkDirectory.
        Specified by:
        processMetadata in interface ImageHandler
        Returns:
        a Metadata object representing extracted PNG metadata
        Throws:
        ImageReadErrorException - if an error occurs while parsing the PNG file
        java.io.IOException - if the file is not in PNG format

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a textual representation of all parsed PNG chunks in this file.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        formatted string of all parsed chunk entries
